td.content: s:pt describes recurrent moderate ulcer on left elbow over the past month. The patient reports moderate ulcer with irregular borders that sometime crusts or bleeds, moderate painful ulcer on the top of lower lip. he is a white male aged 27 yrs. o:Height 176 cm, Weight 101.5 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 16 a:Skin Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 0.5 g topical cream, and ordered Shave biopsy.
